Plays the sound "weapon/sigilcharge" on the Weapon channel, and takes 20 health points from the ..."
revision.text:
{{codepointer|r=Strife|Weapon}} '''A_FireSigil5'''
(''no parameter'')
Plays the sound "weapon/sigilcharge" on the Weapon channel, and takes 20 health points from the player. It then fires a {{Class|SpectralLightningBigBall1}}. This codepointer is restricted to {{Class|Sigil}} and derived classes.
